= network netplan configuration =

== How to Set Static IP Address ==
<pre>
etwork:
  version: 2
  renderer: networkd
  ethernets:
    en01:
      addresses:
      - 192.168.1.25/24
      - "2001:1::1/64"
      gateway4: 192.168.1.1
      gateway6: "2001:1::2"
      nameservers:
        addresses:
        - 8.8.8.8
        - 8.8.4.4
</pre>

<pre>
sudo netplan apply
</pre>

== How to set DHCP Addresses ==
<pre>
network:
  version: 2
  renderer: networkd
  ethernets:
    en01:
      dhcp4: true
      dhcp6: true
</pre>

== How to Set DNS ==
<pre>
ethernets:
  en01:
    [...]
    nameservers:
      search: [lab, home]
      addresses: [8.8.8.8, "FEDC::1"]
</pre>

== How to set WiFi Authentication ==
<pre>
ethernets:
  id0:
    [...]
    access-points:
      mode: infrastructure
      bssid: mywifi
      band: 5GHz
      channel: 5
    auth:
      key-management: none | psk | eap 
      password: my-password-string
</pre>
